name: Cloud Guru Consulting
tag_list: cloud, cloud-computing, cloud-services, software, iaas, saas, paas, cloud-hosting, it-services, salesforce-administration, software-as-a-service, professional-services, cloud-expert
overview:
Cloud Consulting Services for SME and Enterprise

Cloud Guru Consulting offering Pure Cloud Passion consulting Services. With over 20 years experience and contacts within the software, services, hosting and consulting domain, we are one of the few genuine gurus. We offer a jargon free truly bespoke service knowing exactly which products, services and solutions will work best according to your business now and long term plans across IaaS, PaaS, SaaS, Salesforce administration or professional services. Our gurus will be with you through the project and connect you in person to the most appropriate service provider or product.

Specialties:

Cloud IT Consulting, IaaS, SaaS, PaaS, Cloud Hosting, Cloud Security, Professional Services, Salesforce Administration
